author: vincenzo
msg: HasAttachment was ignoring some attachments and reporting others  inexistent: if there was a message with no inline text and an attachment, was erroneously not matching; if the message had inline text with HTML format and no attachments, was erroneously matching.
An overall catch now rethrows a MessagingException, consistently with the new "onException" control.

author: vincenzo

author: vincenzo
msg: Any java.lang.Error thrown by a matcher or a mailet was ending up with the mail message being lost, instead of being sent to the Mail.ERROR processor.
